page.title: 08 INDUSTRY. C.I.CARAVANS
page.content: C.I. Caravans is situated along the Fordham road , just outside Exning. They manufacture touring caravans. The raw materials they use are;wood,steel and aluminium etc. These materials are imported from Poland,Italy and France. This industry is part of a larger International organisation. The factory has been in use for 28 years,although at one time it also manufactured boats and some games. They sell their caravans in the U.K.,U.S.A.,Denmark, Holland and France.To work in an office at this establishment you need a G.C.E. or a typing qualification.Also you need to have some computer knowledge. In the works you need to be "good with your hands."The total workforce is 225.The average length of a working day is about seven and a half hours.
